CustomField.description: Provide Event names in a comma separated values, which we want to Disable
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide Event names in a comma separated values, which we want to Disable Supported values are - BEFORE_INSERT, BEFORE_UPDATE, BEFORE_DELETE,AFTER_INSERT, AFTER_UPDATE, AFTER_DELETE, and AFTER_UNDELETE
CustomField.label: Disabled Events
